nodes.text: Yoda's holocron was a holocron that was made by the Jedi Grand Master Yoda. It was small and contained details on various aspects of the Jedi Code. It was kept in the Jedi Temple on Coruscant and was taken by Jax Pavan when he fled the Temple during Operation: Knightfall in 19 BBY.
Yoda's holocron was mentioned for the first and only time on page 38 of the 2008 novel Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight.
